name: Fps With Dice
description:
FPS Dice
WASD to move, Space to Jump

Left click to shoot

Note:

The dices don't do anything. I never got to implement the dices to give player buffs and enemy buffs.

The Game ends after the second portal. There is only two stages.

Made the stages with umodeler

I made the robot in blender

Everything else I made in unity and vsc

This was a solo project for gtmk jam
